name: Fibi's burning love
description:
The first video game I bring to life entirely ! I motivated myself to rush something realistic and no too ambitious, until it's completely done. Also, the music doesn't really match the atmosphere but i wanted really bad to implement some in my project (this track is home made hehe). As you can guess, it will be really short, but please take time to appreciate details, as much as I enjoyed implementing them !

Peace

Sakipe :)
